Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: <unk19:D0FF1FC822E00C80>
Entry.EnglishText: <unk19:D0FF1FC822E00C80>

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の人
Entry.EnglishText: Woman

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサス
Entry.EnglishText: Belsas

Entry.JapaneseText: ベルサス
Entry.EnglishText: Belsas

Entry.JapaneseText: 道具屋
Entry.EnglishText: Item Shop

Entry.JapaneseText: クルルルゥ……
Entry.EnglishText: Coo... Coo...

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、召使い！ ご主人様のために、 よく働くんだぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, you there, servant! Make sure to work hard for your master, alright?

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの召使いは便利だけど、 仕事が終わったらすぐに部屋から 出さないといけないよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I know that it's useful to have Gajuma servants, but you have to make them leave as soon as they're done working.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマとヒューマは 別世界に住むべきだからね。 あまり、街の中で連れ歩かない ほうがいいよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma and Huma live in different worlds, after all. You shouldn't be walking around with them.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの召使いって、 なかなかイイのがいないんだよね。 文句を言ったり、不器用だったり。
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma don't make good servants. They're clumsy and all they do is complain.

Entry.JapaneseText: キミのガジュマはどうだい？ デカイ割にはおとなしそうで いいなぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: How about yours? He seems rather obedient for one so big. How nice...

Entry.JapaneseText: おっ、キミ…… なかなか使えそうな ガジュマを持ってるね。
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, you. Your Gajuma seems to be handy.

Entry.JapaneseText: どこで見つけて来たんだい？ 僕に譲ってくれないかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Where'd you find him? You wouldn't mind letting me have him, would you?

Entry.JapaneseText: こんなところで道草食ってると、 スカラベさんに大目玉食らうぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: If you're going to waste time wandering around here, then Scarabe is going to give you a hard time!

Entry.JapaneseText: ずいぶん身なりのいいガジュマだな。 こんなガジュマを雇えるのは スカラベさんぐらいだな……
Entry.EnglishText: You're dressed rather elegantly for a Gajuma... Only Scarabe could afford to hire one such as you.

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、逃げて来たんじゃ ないだろうな？ お使いなら、早いとこ 用を済ませて帰れよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I hope you're not thinking of running away. You'd better hurry back once you've finished your errands.

Entry.JapaneseText: お連れの娘、キミの恋人かい？ スカラベさんとこのスージーも キレイだけど、彼女もいいネ！
Entry.EnglishText: Is that your girlfriend? Lord Scarabe's daughter is beautiful, but so is she!

Entry.JapaneseText: 性格も大事だけどさ、 やっぱり顔や見た目って ムシできないよね。
Entry.EnglishText: Of course, it's what's on the inside that counts, but looks and appearances can't be ignored.

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、スカラベさんに 何かあったら、おまえたち ガジュマは大変な事になるぞ。 覚えとけよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Keep this in mind, Gajuma. If anything happens to Lord Scarabe, you'll be in big trouble!

Entry.JapaneseText: なんか、ガジュマたちが スカラベさんの家のほうに 勢いこんで向かったそうだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: It looks as though the Gajuma are heading towards Lord Scarabe's house.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの連中、 何考えてるんだ……？
Entry.EnglishText: I wonder what they're planning?

Entry.JapaneseText: おいおまえ、ガジュマたちが 何を考えてるのか、聞いてないか？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, you! Do you have any idea what those Gajuma are planning?

Entry.JapaneseText: 何か知ってるなら、今のうちに スカラベさんに伝えたほうがいいぞ。 後で泣きたくなかったらな。
Entry.EnglishText: If you know something, then you should tell Lord Scarabe immediately. Unless you want to be crying later.

Entry.JapaneseText: スカラベさんが明日、 ガジュマたちと話し合いを するとか言ってるんだってね。
Entry.EnglishText: Apparently, Lord Scarabe agreed to hold a discussion with the Gajuma tomorrow.

Entry.JapaneseText: 信じられないなぁ…… ガジュマ嫌いのあの人が、 話し合いなんて……
Entry.EnglishText: I can't believe it... How can a man who hates Gajuma so much agree to such a thing...?

Entry.JapaneseText: なあ、あれは本当に女王様なのか？ どうして女王様が、スカラベさんに 連れられて来たんだよ……！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, was that girl really the Queen? Why would she have been with Scarabe?

Entry.JapaneseText: そんなの変だと思わないか？
Entry.EnglishText: Don't you find that peculiar?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……スカラベさんが ガジュマ嫌いなのは 知ってたけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I knew Lord Scarabe hated Gajuma, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: まさか、女王様を殺そうと するなんて……信じられないよ。 スージー、大丈夫かな……
Entry.EnglishText: To think that he'd even dare to kill Her Highness... I wonder if Susie's alright...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとガジュマが 仲間として旅をするなんて…… あんたの仲間、変だよな……
Entry.EnglishText: Huma and Gajuma traveling together... Your group is weird.

Entry.JapaneseText: 軍のお達しで、ガジュマを召使いに するのは禁止になったよ…… あんたのは……仲間だったな……
Entry.EnglishText: The army has declared that we are no longer allowed to keep Gajuma as servants, so that Gajuma must be your companion...

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえはどういうつもりで、 ヒューマと旅をしてるんだ？ おまえはヒューマが憎くないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: What are you doing traveling with Huma? Don't you hate them?

Entry.JapaneseText: 本当かウソか知らんが、 この先の民家に住むマウロは 海賊アイフリードの末えいなんだと。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't know whether this is true or not, but there's a guy named Mauro who lives around here. Allegedly, he's a descendant of Aifread.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>幻の島<White>とか、海賊のお宝とか、 そういう話なら、マウロに 聞いてみたらどうかな？
Entry.EnglishText: Why not try asking him about the <Blue>Island of Illusions<White> or pirate treasure?

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえはどういうつもりで、 ヒューマと旅をしてるんだ？ おまえはヒューマが憎くないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: What are you doing traveling with Huma? Don't you hate them?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ジルバ様の演説以来、 ガジュマたちが日に日に 偉そうになってるよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Ever since Lady Zilva gave her speech, those Gajuma have grown more arrogant by the day...

Entry.JapaneseText: あいつら、そのうち国を乗っ取って、 僕たちヒューマを召使いにするかも しれないよ……くそっ……
Entry.EnglishText: If they take over the country, then they might make us Huma their servants... Damnit...

Entry.JapaneseText: ちゃんと、ご主人様たちの 言う事を聞けよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Make sure to do what your master says.

Entry.JapaneseText: いいガジュマを使ってるね。 見た目は抜群だし、 使い勝手もよさそうだね。
Entry.EnglishText: You have a good Gajuma with you. He looks so distinguished and easy to work with.

Entry.JapaneseText: ワン！
Entry.EnglishText: Woof!

Entry.JapaneseText: クレアというヒューマの娘を 見かけたらすぐに教えてくれ。 隠し立てするとためにならないぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you happen to see a Huma girl named Claire, please inform us immediately. There's no use hiding her.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今は国中が混乱している…… 中でも、ミナールの種族対立は 激化しているらしい。
Entry.EnglishText: This country is in utter chaos... The ethnic conflicts in Minal in particular seem to be growing more intense...

Entry.JapaneseText: 人の往来が多い場所だけに、 一日も早い治安回復が望まれる……
Entry.EnglishText: A lot of people travel through there, so hopefully the peace will be restored as soon as possible...

Entry.JapaneseText: ミナール……
Entry.EnglishText: Minal...

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマどもは、軍と言えど、 我々ヒューマの言う事に 決して従おうとしない。
Entry.EnglishText: Even the Gajuma in the military will refuse to do anything a Huma says.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今度何かあれば、 武力衝突は避けられない かもしれない……
Entry.EnglishText: If something were to happen again, then we might not be able to avoid getting into an armed conflict...

Entry.JapaneseText: 何が起こるかわからない。 どこか安全な場所へ 避難したほうがいいぞ！
Entry.EnglishText: We have no idea what might happen. You should evacuate to somewhere safe.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミール広場が避難所になっている。 ここは我々に任せて避難を！
Entry.EnglishText: Mir Plaza has been designated as an evacuation zone. Leave the fighting to the army and get to safety!

Entry.JapaneseText: 治安が乱れている。 街を歩く時は注意するんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: The security situation is dire. Please exercise caution when walking around town.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……話しかけないで。 用があるなら、あんたの ご主人様を通しなさい！
Entry.EnglishText: Don't talk to me. If you have business with me, then tell your <Italic>master</Italic> to come talk to me!

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっとあんた、 ガジュマと一緒に 何やってるの？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, you, what do you think you're doing, mingling with Gajuma?

Entry.JapaneseText: ここはヒューマの街よ。 いくら召使いと言っても、 ガジュマなんか連れ歩かないで！
Entry.EnglishText: This is a Huma town. Even if he is your servant, you shouldn't be walking around with him!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマのくせに、 高そうな服を来た子だね。 盗んだんじゃないだろうね！
Entry.EnglishText: Those are some fancy clothes for a Gajuma. They better not be stolen!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが 話しかけるんじゃないよ！ まったく不愉快だね！
Entry.EnglishText: Don't talk to me, Gajuma! Ugh, how unpleasant!

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたの連れのガジュマ、 ずいぶん偉そうね！
Entry.EnglishText: That Gajuma you have with you sure seems arrogant!

Entry.JapaneseText: 召使いなんでしょ？ もっとヒューマに対して 控えめにするよう、 しつけなさいよね！
Entry.EnglishText: Isn't he your servant? You need to tell him be more mild-mannered around Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: おや、あなたたち なかなかお似合いねー！
Entry.EnglishText: Oh my, aren't you a cute couple!

Entry.JapaneseText: やっぱり、ヒューマって ガジュマと違って、 美しくて絵になるわねえー。
Entry.EnglishText: I guess that's a given, considering Huma are the epitome of picturesque beauty, unlike Gajuma.
Entry.Notes: original tl: "as I thought, Huma look much better than Gajuma." deepL: After all, Huma are different from Gajuma, Unlike Gajuma, Huma are beautiful and picturesque. So I kinda workshopped it a bit. lemme know what you think.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマが 話しかけるんじゃないよ！ まったく不愉快だね！
Entry.EnglishText: Don't talk to me, Gajuma! Ugh, how unpleasant!

Entry.JapaneseText: スカラベさんのお宅の ほうが騒がしいわね。 何かあったのかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: There's quite the commotion going on over at Lord Scarabe's house. I wonder what's happening over there?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……あんたも、話し合いの件に 一枚かんでるんじゃないだろうね。 その顔……まったく腹立たしい……
Entry.EnglishText: I sure hope you're not taking part in the discussion. I can't stand your face...

Entry.JapaneseText: 明日、ヒューマとガジュマの 話し合いが行われるんですってね！ ガジュマが街に来るなんて 耐えられないわ！
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that there was going to be a discussion between Human and Gajuma held tomorrow. Oooh, I can't stand having Gajuma in town!

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は見たわよ…… あんたがヒューマばかり 殴ってたのをね……
Entry.EnglishText: I saw you beating up those Huma...

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様を助けたからって、 いい気にならないで！
Entry.EnglishText: Don't get so full of yourself just because you managed to save the Queen!

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、あんたはヒューマだから わかるわよね……？ スカラベ様は悪くない…… 悪いのはガジュマよ……！
Entry.EnglishText: You understand as a fellow Huma that Scarabe did nothing wrong, right? It's all those Gajuma's fault!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマの分際で、 話しかけるんじゃないわよ！ あっち行って！
Entry.EnglishText: Talking to a Gajuma is beneath me! Go somewhere else!

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、ガジュマたちが強気で、 調子に乗ってるのよ！ 私たちヒューマの言う事も 聞きやしないのよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Those Gajuma have grown so uppity as of late! They won't listen to a thing we Huma say...

Entry.JapaneseText: 軍の人たちはヒューマばかり 監視してるし…… ああ、腹立たしいわ……！
Entry.EnglishText: And the military is only keeping Huma under surveillance... Oh, the indignity!

Entry.JapaneseText: 国の偉い人が何て言ったか 知らないけどね…… 私はガジュマなんかに 負けやしないんだからね！
Entry.EnglishText: I have no idea what the leaders of this nation are going on about, but I have no intention of kneeling before Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、ガジュマたちが強気で、 調子に乗ってるのよ！ 私たちヒューマの言う事も 聞きやしないのよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Those Gajuma have grown so uppity as of late! They won't listen to a thing we Huma say...

Entry.JapaneseText: 軍の人たちはヒューマばかり 監視してるし…… ああ、腹立たしいわ……！
Entry.EnglishText: And the military is only keeping Huma under surveillance... Oh, the indignity!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ああ……ガジュマの事は 腹立たしい事ばっか！
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, I'm so sick of Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマはガジュマより 素晴らしい種族なの。 それをよく考えてみて。
Entry.EnglishText: Huma outclass Gajuma in every way. Take that to heart.
